snippet: The private Intrepid Fallen Heroes Fund will construct facilities to improve treatment of brain injuries and psychological disorders.
abstract: Intrepid Fallen Heroes Fund, a private foundation, will unveil a $100 million plan to construct state-of-the-art treatment centers for brain injuries and psychological disorders at nine of the largest military bases in the country.
lead_paragraph: The private Intrepid Fallen Heroes Fund will construct facilities to improve treatment of brain injuries and psychological disorders.

headline.seo: Private Group to Build Trauma Centers for Military
headline.main: Group Planning Centers to Treat Combat Trauma
headline.print_headline: Group Planning Centers To Treat Combat Trauma
